General.Name: Ribo Fashion Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Ribo Fashion Group Co., Ltd. engages in design and sale of clothing products for women and kids in China and internationally. The company offers its products under the Broadcast, Broadcute, C_R_Z, MUCHELL, Sirloin, Personal Point, and TAORAY WANG brands. Ribo Fashion Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.
